mapper.select: SELECT challenge_id FROM challenge_participation WHERE challenge_no=#{challenge_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE challenge SET cate=#{cate}, start_day=#{db_start_day}, title=#{title}, limit=#{limit}, poster=#{poster}, content=#{content}, id_leader=#{id_leader}, start_day=#{db_start_day}, end_day=#{db_end_day} WHERE challenge_no=#{challenge_no}
mapper.select: SELECT challenge_id,count(*) as certified_no FROM challenge_certified WHERE challenge_no=#{challenge_no} GROUP BY(challenge_id) ORDER BY count(challenge_id) DESC
